content: The Norwegian Directorate of e-Health has issued an RFI to get information about market availability of FHIR-based repository solutions. Those interested can get more information here: https://www.doffin.no/Notice/Details/2016-790517 and https://kgv.doffin.no/ctm/Supplier/Documents/Folder/148992 (It will shortly be available on http://ted.europa.eu/ also)
